Author: Farouk Friha
Summary: This runbook connects to Azure and stops all VMs (ASM and ARM) in the specified Azure subscription. You can attach a schedule to this runbook to run it at a specific time. A pretty simple runbook to start with Azure Automation.
Title: (Deprecated) Stop all Azure VMs (ARM and ASM) in a subscription
UserTags: Powershell, Azure Automation, Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines
